content:
The chunk situates within the "Cg Shader Tutorial" document, specifically in the "Tutorials" section that follows pre-requisites for understanding Cg shaders in Panda3D. The content includes three introductory shader tutorials and a note about future deprecation of Cg support.

Tutorials

Baseline Panda application <cg-tutorial-part-1>

The Simplest Possible Shader <cg-tutorial-part-2>. So simple that it's useless.

The simplest possible useful shader <cg-tutorial-part-3>.

part-1 part-2 part-3

Note

The use of Cg will be deprecated in a future version of Panda3D.
